case.state: Is this a card game my eyes seek? Ol' Grunty here must take a peek!
A useless card game made for stripping? This better be good, or else I'm dipping.
I am Gruntilda, don't wear it out. I'll play this game without a doubt!
No matter the time, day or night. I'll crush you all with all my might!
I do so well in the crack of night, mainly when there's no bear or bird in sight!
No matter the time, night or day! I'll crush you all with these cards I play!
While I don't do well in the day, at least there's no bear or bird at bay!
My time has come, let's write my story, Grunty will rule the Inventory!
You want me to play? Ugh, fine. But if I win, this place will be mine!
A riveting place to play some cards, you freaks better not be try-hards!
Cards? Who needs 'em?
These are my cards! Get your own!
I'll keep these to myself, go bother some other witch!
These cards fill me up with glee, they are just perfect for me!
A single card to complete the collection!
Only one card will do.
One card shall do the trick!
A single card to seal the deal, this better give me luck for real!
I'll take those two cards off your hands!
Two cards, no more, no less!
A couple of annoying cards. Why does this sound familiar?
Two of these cards that I must rid, wandering eyes while my cards are hid!
I suppose three will do.
Three, if you please.
Three. I said [i]Three[/i] you imbecile!
Three is a magic number I'm told, I will win with these cards I hold.
Hand me four cards at once!
All but one needs to be whisked away.
Most of these cards stink, and not in a good way!
Four cards are to go away, the dealer will surely pay!
All of these cards are cursed! Take them away!
What's so magical about these cards?
Hey, these aren't tarot cards! Off they go!
Dreadful, awful, dastardly cards, I'd like to fling them several yards!
I hope for luck with these cards I switch, for I, Grunty, am the greatest witch!
This round was such an easy breeze, I wonder how you'll beat cards like these!
These cards are such an easy fit, you think you're better? Test your wit!
Looks like my clothes are staying on, try and beat me, you don't have the brawn!
These cards are great, I cannot lie, it almost makes this old cow cry!
I like these cards, they can do a number, Grunty doesn't want to see you cumber!
Grunty can win with relative ease, but what can I do with cards like these?
These cards I carry are hit or miss, but I doubt you chumps can handle this!
Many tricks are up my sleeve, to save yourself you'd better leave!
A single pair will do the trick, you best be making your choice quick!
I wonder who here is dumber than that bear, especially if they can't beat a pair!
These cards fill me with vengeful spite! Maybe some magic will make things right...
I can't believe I made a blunder, I'll come back and take you all under!
Drat! Blast! Confound it all!! These cards do nothing but appall!
Not a single pair in my hands? There goes all of my careful plans!
With nothing but a card of high, don't mock me with a look so wry.
The silent one doesn't cause disgust. What is this feeling, is it lust?
Are my new looks not leaving you scarred? Something's telling me you're getting quite hard.
I feel so lively, so free, so young, I see it's not just spring that has sprung.
Are my new looks making you sweat? I'm not the only one who's getting wet...
I'm really quite stunning, can't you see? Nobody's prettier than me!
My words can really put up a fight. Don't like my harsh words? Go fly a kite.
Your magic goes 'boom'? Big fat deal! My magic has a lot more zeal!
My vigor is stronger than a toad, and all you can do is just explode?
You look ridiculous with that staff, all I can do is roll back and laugh!
If you're so great with those tricks you showed, why not turn yourself into a toad?
That rod of yours is something I hate! Are cauldrons not to appreciate!?
Transform away, I really don't care. Just don't turn into that ugly bear!
Your sense of humor is so dry, makes me think; "Do you even try?"
Black is evil, and white is good. I'd change the order if I could!
Is that a magic cat I spot? Piddles is better by a lot!
You went to school to get your magic? I went to witch college! How tragic!
You're such a buzzkill, goodness me! Everyone else here would agree!
Wasted potential, such a shame. Classic Hermione is really lame!
You went to school to get your magic? I went to witch college! How tragic!
You're such a buzzkill, goodness me! Everyone else here would agree!
Wasted potential, such a shame. This model would surely give you fame.
Just three magic words? What a laugh! Next, you'll tell me you use a staff!
Levitation is overrated, broomsticks are the best, enough stated.
Purple is nice, I will admit, but would black be a better fit?
Cynical, bitter, full of hate. No wonder your play-rates aren't so great!
You shrink girl's boobs just to prove your worth? I would of instead taken their girth!
Obsessed with the player? How sad! Is your self-esteem really that bad?
A lovely voice and such a cutie, you'd be a perfect subject for my beauty!
My broomstick's great, I'm an able flier, can you keep up while your broom goes higher?
So you contact fairies by song? Brentilda could flee with lungs that strong!
You use these cubes to do your tricks? What happened to cauldrons and broomsticks!?
Mechanical magic is fickle, a fancy that I'd not tickle.
I'm jealous that you can rock a cape, with my fat butt, it'd be like a drape.
With arms like those, you're such a freak, such arms would make anyone shriek!
You cause chaos with your arms of four, you're going all out, why not make more?
You're mentally crazed, oh how fun! We could wreck havoc on everyone!
`Dark Magician Girl?' how confusing! Blue and pink are hues not worth using!
A witch with a face so pretty? We can be fetching, have some pity!
We have different meanings of `fun', mine is `rudeness to everyone!'
You're the `Winter Witch?' oh, how bold! Ice is overused, so I'm told!
You use ice, I can use fire! One blow will make you transpire!
How does it feel to be kicked out? Feeling quite bitter, without a doubt?
You use `chaos' as a form of magic? We can join forces to make lives tragic!
Evil or good? Make up your mind! There's no use in being too kind!
How's your brother? Didn't he get shot? Saving his friends were all for naught!
Narcissism at it's peak, because what, you think you're sleek?
A snake at heart, but equally bratty, why even talk with remarks so catty?
You may be mean but I can be meaner, you have to fight with a snide demeanor! ...Yeah, I just rhymed `meaner' with `demeanor', deal with it, chumps!
A witch that chooses not to speak? Or are your vocal chords too weak?
Can I use that board to trim my nails? I love the sound of screeching wails!
Technology, magic, what a mix! Maybe I'll use them for dirty tricks!
An armless girl, with a mind so numb, spouting nonsense, you sure you're not dumb?
Using everything with your feet? Just one low kick with have you beat!
You can paint mindlessly all you want, no matter what you do, I'll still flaunt!
Watch where you point that stupid thing! I'll cast wasps on you, it'll surely sting!
Your looks are dumb, your style is wack, if you think you're cool, I'll give you flak!
The way you flaunt is worth hating, something tells me you're compensating!
You think your guns will give me a scare? Go ahead and shoot me, if you dare!
Your ego is huge, just like my butt, I hardly doubt you have the gut!
A sheriff you say? What a joke! It won't take much to make you croak!
With cups like those, you're not even trying, Climbing is nothing compared to flying!
You insult everyone left and right, are you trying to pick a fight?
You're really pathetic for a man, your sense of pride is weaker than flan!
Who brought this time bomb into the game? Who's the chump I need to shame!?
Your existence must be only pain, don't fret, your death will not be in vain.
I don't understand your clatters and clicks, maybe I'll demolish you just for kicks!
Just look at yourself, you're just a shell. How do you live through a life of hell?
You're surely a trainer like no other, I'm shocked you still get love from your mother.
Hey Moon, would you rather take a dare? Who's more repulsive? Shall we compare?
Your name is `Bi'? That's really rich, It's like calling myself just `Witch!'
He has no style, he has no grace, what the hell is on your face?
Your existence is just a punching bag, next to me, [i]you[/i] seem like the ugly hag!
You think you're suave with all those charms, but you seem to have dirt on your arms!
With nobody to love, I feel pity. I doubt my machine will make you pretty!
The tension is making my face sweaty, and all you do is offer spaghetti?
At last, someone to quell my belly, I'd like your finest cheese, extra smelly!
It's been a while since I'd have eaten, You better cook something fast, you cretin!
Oh great, another talking bird, They're deceitful, haven't you heard?
Shoo your talking bird away, I'm not dealing with two today!
Getting electrified is no haven, if your powers come from that raven!
You better throw your cards in the bin. Mine are the best, you lose, I win!
All I know is your cards are mush. For I have the perfect Royal Flush!
If legs aren't your thing at all, I better give Cheato a call!
In order for me to win for sure, I'll summon Cheato to find my cure!
It's about time I lost a hand, all of you are playing so bland!
I'm in the lead with only one loss, you're all my minions and I'm the boss!
I'm way too good, your fates are grim, all of you must be surely dim!
Most of you are losing your place, is it my charm? my beautiful face?
Knocked me down to my final layer? I'll humor you, you naughty player~
If legs aren't your thing at all, I better give Cheato a call!
I lost a hand, who even cares? I can do better than measly pairs!
I'm not winning, but I'm not losing, not being 1st is quite the bruising.
Looking down, your eyes are drawn, only one more layer to be gone!
I'm the loser, so I take my turn, but next time, the loser's clothes should burn!
If you think I'm done, you're all amiss. It's time to go all out, watch this!
I've got this skirt so when I'm thinner, it really makes me look a winner!
That was just some beginner's luck, sooner or later, I'll make you cluck!
So my scarf was not enough? I'll go lower, don't give me guff!
Lady Luck must surely be dead, so I'll use a magic spell instead!
Things are not going my way, I'll come back, and you all will pay!
Even with my new found looks, luck seems to favor you schnooks!?
With one layer left, I'm filled with doubt, I'll seek vengeance and go all out!
Eye of newt, and all that jazz, Grunty needs a bountiful ass!
Using a hex to gain my beauty, Cheato, you better make me a cutie!
Abracadabra Alakazam! Becoming a beauty is all that I am!
You must be thinking, what brings me here? Well shut your traps and lend me your ear!
My scarf is gone, so the shoes must fly, I hope I hit someone in the eye!
The final layer has been shed, I can't imagine what's in your head.
Why must stripping be so taxing? My back certainly isn't relaxing!
I'm getting quite good with my stripping. Are you glad that my dress is slipping?
